name: Police Run
description:
Take your chances and earn.

Upgrade your car to get better scores.

Risk it all, when going against the traffic.

There you go, well done on making it through the advanced driving course, your scores were outstanding!

Now for your final test.

In this endless highway racer where you will put your learnt skills to the test. As a police recruit you now have one final task before you qualify; which is to  drive as far as you can without damaging the car and avoiding the traffic.

Good luck!
